text: Peter William Sutcliffe (2 June 1946 - 13 November 2020) was a British serial killer known as the Yorkshire Ripper. He was born in Bingley, West Riding of Yorkshire.ci In 1981, he was convicted of murdering thirteen women and attempting to murder seven others. He was diagnosed with paranoid schizophrenia. He served twenty sentences of life imprisonment in Broadmoor High Security Hospital. ==Personal life== Sutcliffe married Sonia Szurma 10 August 1974. They lived together in Heaton, Bradford. Sutcliffe died on 13 November 2020 while in prison in Durham from COVID-19, aged 74.Yorkshire Ripper serial killer Peter Sutcliffe has died == References == Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom Category:English people convicted of murder Category:English prisoners Category:English serial killers Category:People from West Yorkshire Category:People with schizophrenia Category:Prisoners sentenced to life imprisonment
title: Peter Sutcliffe
